path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/NFT Global Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to modify critical parameters and functions even after ownership renouncement.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward(), _getCurrentSupply, and Airdrop() use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list or addresses list is too long.

findings.title: Unchecked arrays length
findings.description: The function Airdrop() uses the loop for transferring amounts from list to addresses from list. It does not compare receiver’s length to match amounts length.
